page.title: 11CHANGES IN BEKESBOURNE
page.content: I live in Bekesbourne I like it there.There is a station in Bekesbourne, my dad uses the train to get to London but not every day.There is also a church and we walk through the churchyard,I read the grave stones.There is an old Aerodrome but there aren't any aeroplanes now.The Aerodrome was used in the war. Bekesbourne School closed in{1971} and the children from Bekesbourne now go to Bridge Primary School.The new Bridge School was opened in{1971.} Before that children from Bridge,Patrixbourne and Bishopsbourne went to the old school in Patrixbourne Road.Bishopsbourne School closed in{ {1951.}In{1953}Bridge School had three classes for children from 5_11.At the age of 11 children went to the Secondary Modern School at Sturry or the Simon Langton Grammer School.
